posts.text: A useful analogy Iâ€™ve heard is between cognitive bias and optical illusions. Squares A & B in the famous Adelson Checkerboard Illusion are exactly the same shade of grey. You can confirm this by cutting them away from or covering the surrounding imagery. BUT YOU STILL SEE THE ILLUSION.

The second you leave this country for even a few days, you realize the place you call home is decaying at an almost exponential pace. The realization that you don't have to live like this is stark, and that nobody in power is taking tangible actions to fix it in your lifetime is even starker.

We're in a strange situation rn where Google can train freely on books from university librariesâ€”but researchers *at* universities have limited access. I'm optimistic this can be fixed, but if you're in admin or working at a foundation, please know: univs are failing here & resources are needed.

posts.text:
Patton: And Mr. Schrader did put his thoughts in writing, and he asked you to pass his thoughts along to relevant parties in DC, right? And he did that because he knew that DC was involved in the charging decision in this case?

McGuire: I don't know why he asked that, I really don't....

reply_context.text:
Patton: You end by telling people not to put their thoughts in writing? Isn't it true you didn't want people putting in writing we shouldn't be charging this case?

McGuire: No, if someone emailed this to me, it would've been fine. But I thought it would be better to discuss as a group.

posts.text:
Patton: You end by telling people not to put their thoughts in writing? Isn't it true you didn't want people putting in writing we shouldn't be charging this case?

McGuire: No, if someone emailed this to me, it would've been fine. But I thought it would be better to discuss as a group.

reply_context.text:
Patton: And in this email you say that you heard DAG and PDAG want the case charged sooner rather than later. Where did you hear that? 

McGuire: I had heard that but I honestly don't remember where. I wanted to be transparent with team that I heard that but did not receive specific direction

posts.text:
Patton: So on the day you find out about this case, Mr. Singh already knows about a witness in the case? 

McGuire: Yes I believe so. The witness had been interviewed by HSI before I got involved. 

Patton: You had a call the next morning with Singh and the US Attorneys? 

McGuire: Yes

reply_context.text:
